active_projects.description: Review .claude/ directory for remaining improvements needed for Neovim configuration focus. After completing tasks 19, 20, and 21 which adapted the system from Lean to Neovim, identify what else needs updating - specifically focusing on context/ files that may need improvement or expansion for the new Neovim maintenance use case.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive review of .claude/context directory identifying 61 files with Lean references, 19 files with ProofChecker references, and 16 prioritized recommendations for Neovim adaptation
5-phase implementation plan for updating .claude/ directory from Lean to Neovim context

active_projects.description: Update .claude/ documentation to remove Lean references and reflect Neovim focus. Found 128+ files with Lean/theorem/proof references including: .claude/README.md (51 refs), docs/architecture/system-overview.md (14 refs), context/index.md (4 refs), plus extensive refs in docs/guides/, context/core/, context/project/, skills/, agents/, commands/, and rules/. Need systematic review to replace Lean examples with Neovim examples, update architecture descriptions, fix outdated language routing tables, and ensure all documentation accurately reflects the stock Neovim configuration system.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of 88 files with Lean references, categorized by priority with specific change recommendations
7-phase implementation plan for updating .claude/ documentation to remove Lean references and reflect Neovim focus
Implementation summary documenting all 7 phases of documentation updates

active_projects.completion_summary: Systematically updated .claude/ documentation to remove 587+ Lean references across 88 files. Updated routing tables, skill/agent mappings, file path examples, and metrics. Reduced Lean references to ~135 in lower-priority files.
active_projects.claudemd_suggestions: Updated .claude/CLAUDE.md with complete Neovim focus rewrite, updated routing tables in orchestration files, updated skill-to-agent mappings throughout documentation

active_projects.description: Update specs/README.md to provide a brief overview of the directory contents, noting that numbered project directories accumulate and are archived to specs/archive/ by the /todo command

artifacts.summary: Research report identifying gaps in specs/README.md including missing archive documentation, outdated project numbering conventions, and absence of state file documentation
2-phase implementation plan to update specs/README.md with corrected project numbering and archive documentation
Implementation summary documenting all changes made to specs/README.md

active_projects.completion_summary: Updated specs/README.md to document the directory lifecycle, state management files (TODO.md, state.json, archive/state.json), correct project numbering convention, and archival workflow via /todo command.

active_projects.description: Adapt the current .claude/ agent system (designed for Lean codebase) to produce a stock .claude/ agent system for Neovim configuration maintenance that can be systematically extended for specific applications

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive research report with component categorization, architecture analysis, proposed Neovim system design, and 7-task implementation plan (14-21 hours estimated)
7-phase plan covering core extraction, Neovim context creation, agents, skills, rules, routing integration, and documentation
Implementation summary with full change list

active_projects.completion_summary: Transformed .claude/ system from Lean 4 theorem proving to stock Neovim configuration. Created 17 Neovim context files, 2 specialized agents, 2 skills, and neovim-lua rule. Updated CLAUDE.md, routing, and documentation. Added extension guide for new domains.
active_projects.claudemd_suggestions: Complete rewrite of .claude/CLAUDE.md for Neovim focus, updated context/index.md with Neovim sections, updated skill-orchestrator routing, added neovim-lua.md rule, created docs/guides/adding-domains.md, updated copy-claude-directory.md
